font_family.primary: JetBrains Mono, Fira Code, Source Code Pro, monospace

rules: Use uppercase for all section headers
Use 'glitch' text effect on hover for main titles
Letter spacing should be slightly wider for body text (tracking-wide)

effects.name: Scanlines
effects.css: background-size: 100% 4px; background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,0.5) 50%); pointer-events: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; z-index: 50;

rules: Use 1px borders to separate grid items
No gaps between cards in dense mode, use borders instead
Sidebar should be fixed width (64px or 240px)

Card.overrides: Remove all shadows, remove rounded corners. Add 'corner' accents using pseudo-elements.

Button.style: bg-matrix-green text-black hover:bg-white hover:text-black rounded-none font-bold uppercase tracking-widest transition-colors duration-75

variants.outline: bg-transparent border border-matrix-green text-matrix-green hover:bg-matrix-green hover:text-black

Input.style: bg-black border border-matrix-dark text-matrix-green focus:border-matrix-green focus:ring-0 rounded-none placeholder:text-matrix-dark/50

MatrixRain.description: Falling green characters (Katakana + Latin) with fading trails.

accessibility.contrast: High Contrast (Green on Black passes AAA)
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable Matrix Rain and Flicker effects if prefers-reduced-motion is true

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Matrix Rain' effect using a custom React Canvas component.
Override Shadcn/UI default styles to remove all rounded corners (radius: 0).
Use the 'JetBrains Mono' or similar monospace font for the entire application.
Ensure the 'Scanline' overlay is present but does not block interactions (pointer-events-none).
For the Dashboard, use a dense grid layout where every pixel is utilized.
Login page must be immersive: Full screen Matrix rain, centered login box with solid black background and green border.
Settings page: Use custom checkboxes that look like terminal toggles [ ] / [x].
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, only for subtle effects like scanlines.
All data visualizations (gauges, charts) must use the primary green color palette.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
